user.title: Spotify Statistics Setup
user.description: Configure your Spotify account for statistics tracking. You'll need API credentials from the Spotify Developer Dashboard.

data_description.username: Your Spotify username or display name (e.g., 'ian')
data_description.client_id: Client ID from your Spotify Developer app
data_description.client_secret: Client Secret from your Spotify Developer app
data_description.now_playing_interval: How often to check what's currently playing (minimum 30 seconds)
data_description.recently_played_interval: How often to check recently played tracks (minimum 300 seconds)

error.already_configured: This username is already configured. Please use a different username or remove the existing configuration first.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Spotify. Please check your credentials.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication credentials. Please check your Client ID and Client Secret.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This Spotify account is already configured.

init.description: Adjust update intervals for this account.
